BHP prompted Cindy to sit with her peers. Cindy complied with the BHP’s prompt and sat appropriately with her peers for 8 minutes. BHP verbally prompted Cindy to greet her peers. Cindy complied with 80% of prompts. BHP prompted Cindy to share the animal book with peers, Cindy refused. --------==--==-----mmemmeemeeeeeeeeo---4/27/2021 Sarah Smith, BHP
